fajna gierka żeby pograć z kolegami
Прячься или умри)

我覺得
看了蠻多案例
官方處理BUG的 速度有點慢 或是誤觸BUG就把別人BAN掉不能玩遊戲

1. 我覺得官方處理問題可以這樣做:人可以提供BUG問題: 官方可以把地圖或是物品附件先鎖起來做維修 就跟之前惡靈古堡地圖一樣先做維修還有斷線處罰，問題有些人斷線可是連線沒出錯，就封鎖遊玩時間?這也要處理一下

2. 人，鬼卡圖問題: 結束，卡住無法結束你退出會受到官方懲罰封鎖遊玩時間

3.再來就是外掛問題:你遇到外掛，你離開受到官方懲罰，那不是就一定要跟這外掛遊玩一場遊戲

4.還有官方的自動檢舉審查系統問題:你只要被檢舉太多你就會被封鎖，就會被冠上 消極態度或是跟鬼合作，審判機制問題假如你被鬼追整天或是鬼好心放你走都會莫名的被官方的自動檢舉審查系統封鎖到

5.道具配件和地圖問題:發現很多人推薦這道具配件，可是你沒想到官方是要BAN用這的玩家道具配件
(我感覺不用BAN人，測試服到正試服有一段時間都到正試服才發現問題官方直接就要BAN玩家，還有希望官方發現問題第一時間希望先封鎖道具配件和地圖而不是玩家)(這樣好像玩家都是你的測試人員，用完就BAN玩家)

6.斷線問題:連線穩定:無法正常遊:懲罰區配(希望每天減少懲罰時間)

我最近遊戲的看法
1.玩鬼保持好心態，大約你會遇到會遊玩人類你死追大約2分鐘就會修好一台
2.你看到人類拿著工具箱你就可以輕鬆玩一下
3.玩人也是保持好心態
4.活動設計很好
5.遊玩模式問題希望可以增加一些模式

雖然競技類遊戲很難平衡可是我還是蠻喜歡這遊戲
NOT BAD

Dead by Daylight is, to me, the very definition of the word 'Rough'. Its a hard sell, absolutely, And ill tell you that this game has some major flaws in its system. Some Talents are completely broken, some killers are directly better than others, and the fact over half of the killers are paid DLC, is a bit ludicrous, absolutely, especially at 20 dollars.

However, Dead by Daylight provides a Cat and Mouse style multiplayer experience that, as ive tried many times, Has not yet been replicated.

If your the kind of person who likes horror games but doesnt like getting jumpscared, you may actually find DbD to be surprisingly adequate in the 'I dont wanna buy new underwear every two seconds' department, as i too am the kind of guy who covers his eyes and ears and nostrils for some reason when he thinks a jumpscare is coming up in a movie, yet playing as a survivor is just fine for me. And as a Killer, the game is just plain fun no matter what.

7/10, Unique game, Very fun, Very Rough Very big cash cow.

After a long time of seemingly enjoying this game, playing it is simply a chore now. The Developers don't listen to public outcries in either direction, and the meta has stagnated to the point that only around 10 of the perks and the abilities in the game are ever used, and even then some of the abilities are tied exclusively to the retail killers (main point: Barbeque and Chili for Leatherface) and the devs have done nothing about any of this, instead they are more concerned with adding more trite, arbitrary side-quests to occupy the players time that feel extremely unnatural to obtain and restrict the killers and survivors to extremely jarring and unfun play styles.

Back when I first got the game, before dumping 613 Hours into the game, I would certainly recommend the game to anyone, but after this long time and lots of painful and downright depressing realizations. I've discovered that this game is frankly lower par, and I recommend getting another game over this one.

EDIT: As of 1745 Hours, this game's critique is literally the same because the game has not changed and has not improved over the 3 years I've played since this review.

처음 두시간정도 공포게임 느낌을 받을 수 있을떄 충분히 즐겨두세요.
그 이후에는 어떻게하면 더 참신하게 상대에게 엿을 줄 수 있을지를 고민하게 됩니다.
물론 롤이나 옵치와는 다르게 타인과 나 자신의 이타심을 느낄 수 있는 힐링게임으로 경쟁게임을 하다가 지친 멘탈을 수습할 수 있는 좋은 창구가 됩니다. 경쟁전을 하다 샷건치면 이 게임을 하면서 내면의 남아있는 인간성을 느끼며 마음을 치유하고있습니다.

I LOVE THIS GAME.

Sadly, because many people think its a horror game they wont try it. Its not just horror, eventualy you get over it. Its only scary the first few times you play. The TRUE soul of this game lies in how fun it is. If you ever feel like playing a game where you dont have to feel bad about your aiming skills, try this game. This game still requires skill, is easy to understand you have got to not die by running, but is hard to master. 

In this game you pretty much are gonna have to run for as long as you can if the killer finds you. You can throw pallets on the killer, or troll him in different ways, until you finally lose him and you laugh because of how fun the chase was and how good it feels to have won the chase. Its so fun, more people should play it!

A fun, challenging game, worth playing with or without friends (though certainly better with company). Whether you play as killer or survivor, you'll be engrossed in the game, unlocking new perks for your chosen characters and progressing their bloodwebs until you prestige. Give this game a try if you want a genuinely somewhat scary little title with a lot to offer, especially if you've got friends to play with!
This is my absolute FAVORITE game right now. I am addicted to the new tome and rift. I have never kept up with a game like I do Dead by Daylight. I can't wait to see what else they add!
